Group (2023-present):
The Wind until Dec 6, 2023

Introduction

Shin Jaewon is a South Korean singer.

He debuted as a member of the boy group The Wind on May 15, 2023 with the release of the mini album "Beginning: The Wind Page". On December 6 of the same year, With US Entertainment announced that Shin Jaewon had departed from the group for personal reasons, and, two months later, on February 28, confirmed that they had mutually agreed to end Shin Jaewon’s exclusive contract with the agency.

On September 26, 2024, he was revealed as a contestant on JTBC's survival show PROJECT7 starting in October 2024.
